articles.content: Shares of IndusInd Bank plunged by 10.71 per cent to Rs 1061.45 on Monday (November 8) on the BSE after the bank reported that nearly 84,000 loans were disbursed by its microfinance arm “without the … [+3293 chars]

articles.title: TVS Motor clarifies on reports of fundraising for EV subsidiary, stock slips from highs - Mint
articles.description: TVS Motor said that there is no such negotiation taking place. The company is yet to incorporate the subsidiary for electric mobility business
articles.content: Two-wheeler maker TVS Motor on Tuesday issued a clarification statement on media reports with respect to the company looking for PE investments in proposed EV subsidiary. TVS said that there is no su… [+101 chars]

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Installation of Private Electric Vehicle Charger Will Cost Delhi Residents Rs. 2,500 - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Delhi government will charge only Rs. 2,500 to install private chargers for light electric vehicles, including two and three wheelers at malls, apartments, hospitals, and such other places in the city.
articles.content: Delhi government will charge only Rs 2,500 to install private chargers for light electric vehicles, including two and three wheelers at malls, apartments, hospitals and such other places in the city.… [+3170 chars]

articles.title: Freshworks' CEO, employees and others to sell shares worth over $500 Mn - Entrackr
articles.description: A poster-child of the Indian SaaS space, Freshworks has initiated a share sale of more than $500 million for its senior-level leadership, employees and other shareholders, making it one of the largest cashouts by an Indian startup this year.  The company has …
